alert.note: Alert for Clackamas; Marion (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 22 at 10:43AM PST until December 25 at 8:53AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon... Pudding River at Aurora affecting Clackamas and Marion Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pudding River at Aurora. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Above 22.0 feet, expect widespread minor flooding of low-lying agricultural lands and access roads along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10 AM PST Wednesday, the stage was 23.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is very slowly recede, dropping below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 10 PM PST this evening.
